Extract V-Dem and V-Party data

Source: R/extract_vdem.R
extract_vdem.Rd

Functions to import the V-Dem and the V-Party datasets from the {vdemdata} package in a many packages universe consistent format.

Usage

import_vdem()

import_vparty()

Value

A dataframe of the[vdem] dataset in a many packages universe-consistent format.

A dataframe of the[vparty] dataset consistent with the many packages universe.

Details

import_vdem() imports the latest version of VDEM dataset and formats it to be consistent with the many packages universe.

import_vparty() imports the latest version of the V-Party dataset and formats it to be consistent with the many packages universe.

Examples

# \donttest{
import_vdem()
#> # A tibble: 27,555 × 4,598
#>    vdemID stateID StateName State  Beg   End   Year  Date  codingstart codingend
#>     <dbl> <chr>   <chr>     <chr>  <mda> <mda> <mda> <mda>       <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1      3 MEX     Mexico    Vicer… 1789  1820  1789  1789…        1789      2022
